entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 12 February 2023
